p: In summary, previous research underlines the potential of physical exercise during cancer treatment on improving outcomes such as physical function, mental health, fatigue, and quality of life in women with breast cancer. [ 35â€“ 37] However, research on the specific cellular effects of RT during chemotherapy is scarce. This study will provide important knowledge regarding the effects of heavy-load RT on skeletal muscle cellular outcomes. In addition, increased knowledge regarding the effects of RT on a selection of antitumor myokines as well as muscle strength and cardiorespiratory fitness may be provided.
